titles: A modest discourse, of the piety, charity & policy of elder times and Christians. Together with those their vertues paralleled by Christian members of the Church of England. / By Edward Waterhouse Esq;
author: Waterhouse, Edward, 1619-1670.
publisher: Printed by A.M. for Simon Miller, and are to be sold at his shop at the Star in St Pauls Church-yard,
notes: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Church of England --  Early works to 1800.
